name: Glow Ice Hockey Table Extreme Fight Shootout 2017
name_original: Glow Ice Hockey Table Extreme Fight Shootout 2017
description:
glow ice hockey extreme game is easy and fun to play!

this game works like a classic air hockey table game but it will bring you even more fun. new style of the air ice hockey multiplayer game.

how to play:
- control your player with your finger
- try to get the hockey puck shooting into your opponent's goal
- you score if the puck appears on your opponent's side of the ball
- the game ends when either player has scored 5 goals

addictive all the glow ice hockey sports game for every generation also kids and adults. You can download for FREE Now!
